author: Fe Online
title: Newly turned global star, Deepika Padukone to perform at Justin Bieber's India Tour? - The Financial Express
text:
Newly turned global star, Deepika Padukone to perform at Justin Bieber’s India Tour? Newly turned global star, Deepika Padukone to perform at Justin Bieber’s India Tour? The show is scheduled for May 10 in DY Patil Stadium. “Deepika is among the celebrities, who are keen to perform at the concert. A lot of big names are there but no one has been confirmed yet,” said a source. By: FE Online | Updated: February 23, 2017 3:39 PM (IE) 
Rumours say that newly global actress Deepika Padukone will perform with singer-songwriter Justin Bieber in his maien India Tour. Sources close to the development have suggested that, Bollywood celebrities like Alia Bhatt, Varun Dhawan and Sidharth Malhotra, the trio of Student Of The Year, might also perform with Justin Bieber, at his Mumbai event. The show is scheduled for May 10 in DY Patil Stadium. “Deepika is among the celebrities, who are keen to perform at the concert. A lot of big names are there but no one has been confirmed yet,” a source close to the development told indianexpress.com. 
Padukone after her stint at Hollywood has already gained global fame. She co-starred with Vin Diesel in xXx: Return of Xander Cage. Soon after the film, she was seen at the Golden Globes after party and also in some coveted US chat shows. 
You May Also Like To Watch: 
We’ll all have to wait and watch if the rumour is true. Bieber is coming to India with his highly-successful ‘Purpose World Tour’. This is going to be the Asia leg of the tour for which he’ll come to Mumbai. Bieber will perform hits like “Where Are Ace Now”, “Boyfriend”, “Love Yourself”, “Company”, “As Long As You Love Me”, “What Do You Mean?”, “Baby” and “Purpose”at the concert. For the Asia leg, the 22-year-old singer-songwriter will also visit Tel Aviv and Dubai. The tour has so far covered the USA, Canada and Japan. 
The ticket sales today went live on BookMyShow and as jaw-dropping as it can get, the highest price for a ticket is Rs 76,790. The range starts from Rs 4,060. Please Wait while comments are loading...
